news.title: Open House: Special Thanks
news.content:
We would like to thank The BigVan for joining our 10th anniversary 'Open House' event. 
To see their video, press 'See Full'.

news.title: Open House: Afterwards
news.content:
At the 10th anniversary event, the winners actually got to try their hand at making ramen noodles.
We were happy to see everyone's smiling faces!

The gift event is still going on, so please visit our restaurant!
To see the pictures from the event, press 'See Full'.

news.title: Open House Tickets Results
news.content:
Dear valued customers,
The 'Open House' ticket waiting is over, we are excited to announce the final winners:

- Matthew W.
- Janet M.
- Hayley V.
- Cody L.
- Alejandra T.
- Maggie Y.
- Hermia J.

We have already sent out the invitation letters through our email. So please check your inbox or junk mail for the invitation. We need your response before Jun.14th to secure your seats.

Thanks,
Yah-Yah-Ya Ramen

news.title: Our website is online!
news.content:
Dear customers,

Our Yah-Yah-Ya Ramen website is officially online right now. please come to check our news and updates anytime.

Yah-Yah-Ya Ramen
